name: Prehistoric Pilfering
description:
This is a game made for the SpaceScore Jam 1!

This is my first game and I had a lot of fun making it, but remember the focus is on getting the fastest speedrun possible!

WARNING: Some browsers have a small lag at the end of the third level before the end screen with your times. It does still move foward and you just have to wait a few seconds, but it is a bug that occurs occasionally depending on the browser and computer. - this issue occured only on a chromebook from 2015

How to Play

- Use the arrow keys to move and jump

- To restart only the current level press Control + R, it's like a checkpoint

- to restart the entire game at level one press Control + P , a total reset back to level 1<IMPORTANT> Put your best time screenshots in the comments section. I'll update the leaderboard from there.<IMPORTANT>

The Leaderboard will only be updated every 30 minutes during the Jam
